message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $950,000. This is a great price, considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $800,000.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a great deal. While $800,000 is my minimum, I believe this product is worth more. I'm willing to come down to $850,000. This reflects its value and allows for a fair deal for both of us. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $820,000.
